NK010(tha)029:0: rgyud lugs rdo rje phur pa'i las byang phrin las thogs med bzhugs so //
NK010(tha)029:1: na mo sh+r+ai badz+ra ku m+aa r+aa ya /
NK010(tha)029:2: rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las sku //
NK010(tha)029:3: rdo rje gzhon nu la btud nas //
NK010(tha)029:4: de yi bsnyen sgrub rim pa la //
NK010(tha)029:5: 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyud bzhin bri //
NK010(tha)029:6: 'dir dbang thob cing dam tshig la gnas pas rdo rje phur pa sgrub pa la /
NK010(tha)029:7: dam tshig gi rdzas thams cad tshogs par byas nas /
NK010(tha)029:8: thog mar mdun du skyabs yul rnams gsal btab la /
NK010(tha)029:9: rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas dpal sogs kyis tshogs bsags nas /
NK010(tha)029:10: bgegs la bka' bsgo ba ni /
NK010(tha)029:11: h'u nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs nga yi
NK010(tha)029:12: bka' las 'da' ma byed rdo rje gsang ba'i bka'
NK010(tha)029:13: las ni sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa stobs
NK010(tha)029:14: chen khro bo chen po yis klad pa tshal pa
NK010(tha)029:15: brgya ru khos drag sngags dang sum b+ha nis gzir
NK010(tha)029:17: h'u mi shigs mtshon cha'i gur dang sa gzhi la
NK010(tha)029:18: dmar nag dmar smug me yi 'du 'phro 'khyil ye
NK010(tha)029:19: shes khro bo bcu yang dbyings nas bzhengs khrag 'thung
NK010(tha)029:20: rol pa'i lha tshogs nang na bzhugs mtshams kyi dkyil
NK010(tha)029:21: 'khor ma lus lhun gyis grub badz+ra rak+sha rak+sha b+h+r+aum
NK010(tha)029:23: h'u srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang dbang dang
NK010(tha)029:24: dngos grub blang ba'i phyir dus gsum rgyal ba thams
NK010(tha)029:25: cad kyi gnyis med sbyor ba'i mkha' dbyings nas sngon
NK010(tha)029:26: gyi thugs dam ji bzhin du ye shes khro bo
NK010(tha)029:27: gshegs su gsol ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang
NK010(tha)029:28: sku yi gzi byin ya la la gsung gi 'brug
NK010(tha)029:29: sgra 'u ru ru thugs rje'i 'od zer glog ltar
NK010(tha)029:30: 'khyugs khro bo khro mo char ltar 'bebs rnal 'byor
NK010(tha)029:31: bdag la byin gyis rlobs sgrub rdzas rnams la nus
NK010(tha)029:32: pa skyed rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang k+ai
NK010(tha)029:33: la ya yi dngos grub stsol badz+ra k+ai li k+ai
NK010(tha)029:34: la ya dz+ny+aa na +aa be sha ya phem phem
NK010(tha)029:35: mchod rdzas byin gyis brlab pa ni /
NK010(tha)029:38: mnyam nyid kun tu bzang po'i klong yangs su snang
NK010(tha)029:39: srid bde ba chen por rang shar ba phyi nang
NK010(tha)029:40: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig rdzas mu mtha' med
NK010(tha)029:41: pa nam mkha' mdzod du gyur badz+ra ar+g+ham sogs nas
NK010(tha)029:42: shap+ta +aahmh'u sarba pany+tsa a mri ta h'u h+r+aihtha ma
NK010(tha)029:43: h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la man+da la h'u h+r+aihtha +aahmh'u ma
NK010(tha)029:44: h+aa ba ling+ta te dz+wa ba ling+ta b+ha la ba
NK010(tha)029:45: te gu h+ya sa ma ya h'u h+r+aihtha ma h+aa
NK010(tha)029:46: bo d+hi tsit+ta ga na gu h+ye d+harma d+h+aa tu
NK010(tha)029:47: ma h+aa su kha p+au tsa ho de nas dam
NK010(tha)029:49: h'u rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod mtshon chen
NK010(tha)029:50: sngon po 'bar ba ni nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs
NK010(tha)029:51: pa shar e yam ram sum kem ram b+h+r+aum dbyings
NK010(tha)029:52: kyi nam mkha' gru gsum ngang rlung khrag sha chen
NK010(tha)029:53: keng rus me 'jigs pa'i dur khrod gzhal yas khang
NK010(tha)029:54: phyi ni rin chen lnga las grub 'dod yon sna
NK010(tha)029:55: tshogs sprin ltar gatibah nang ni dur khrod gzhal yas
NK010(tha)029:56: khang drag po'i bkod pa yongs su rdzogs phyi rim
NK010(tha)029:57: dur khrod chen po brgyad sna tshogs bkod pas 'jigs
NK010(tha)029:58: su rung b+h+rum bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+ny+aa na tsakra
NK010(tha)029:59: man+da la b+h+rum gzhal yas chen po de yi dabusah
NK010(tha)029:60: gru gsum mthing nag zla gam gsum gnam lcags 'khor
NK010(tha)029:61: lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar dbus su ru tra bsnol ba'i
NK010(tha)029:62: khri pad+ma nyi ma bdud bzhi'i steng drug pa rdo
NK010(tha)029:63: rje 'chang chen po sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes
NK010(tha)029:64: sku ngang nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las 'bar ba'i
NK010(tha)029:65: khro bo mi bzad pa dpal chen rdo rje gzhon
NK010(tha)029:66: nu yi sku yi dbyig tu bdag bskyed do sgeg
NK010(tha)029:67: pa dpa' ba gar dgu pa rab 'jigs me dpung
NK010(tha)029:68: dkyil na bzhugs zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ste
NK010(tha)029:69: zhabs gnyis gyad kyi 'dor thabs bgrad zhabs gnyis brkyang
NK010(tha)029:70: bskums tshul du bzhugs skra barjesa bzhad khro gshe ba'i
NK010(tha)029:71: zhal spyan dmar smin ma sma ra ser khro gnyer
NK010(tha)029:72: chu yi rlabs bzhin 'khrugs phyag drug g.yas kyi dang
NK010(tha)029:73: po yis gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams bar
NK010(tha)029:74: pas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin g.yon gyi dang pos
NK010(tha)029:75: me dpung bsnams bar pas kha t+aam rtse gsum thogs
NK010(tha)029:76: mtha' gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril mthing nag sku
NK010(tha)029:77: la dur khrod brgyan 'khor lo rgyas 'debs sbyor ba'i
NK010(tha)029:78: yum zhal gcig phyag gnyis bde ba'i sku sbrul dang
NK010(tha)029:79: thod pa gzig gis brgyan dril bu thod khrag bsnams
NK010(tha)029:80: nas 'khyud gtso bo'i sku yi g.yon phyogs su e
NK010(tha)029:81: ka tsa ti sgrol ba'i yum gri gug thod khrag
NK010(tha)029:82: khams gsum sgrol dril bu g.yer kha nyid las kyang
NK010(tha)029:83: rtog med chos kyi sgra 'byin ma ma mo bcu
NK010(tha)029:84: drug pho nyar 'gyed yab kyi thugs kar dpal be'i
NK010(tha)029:85: klong badz+ra sa t+wa yab yum ni mtshan dang dpe
NK010(tha)029:86: byad yang dag rdzogs rdo rje dril bu bde bar
NK010(tha)029:87: 'khyud kun+da lta bur dkar ba'i mdog srog gi go
NK010(tha)029:88: ru shar ba dang thugs kar nyi dkyil rdo rje'i
NK010(tha)029:89: dbus h'u la sngags kyis bskor ba ni snying gi
NK010(tha)029:90: dkyil du bsgom par bya badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la
NK010(tha)029:91: ya d+ai p+ta tsakra ha na ha na ru lu
NK010(tha)029:92: ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u dam tshig ye shes chen
NK010(tha)029:93: po yi pad+mo rin chen ldan byas nas phyogs bcu'i
NK010(tha)029:94: bde gshegs thams cad kyang bde mchog sgyu ma'i brda
NK010(tha)029:95: 'dis bskul h'u rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig 'dzin rnams
NK010(tha)029:96: srid pa rdo rjer grub mdzod cig srid pa rdo
NK010(tha)029:97: rje phur pa'i lha ye shes khro bor grub par
NK010(tha)029:98: mdzod sa ma ya ho sa ma ya s+t+wam dzahmh'u
NK010(tha)029:99: bam hoh yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba yi bde
NK010(tha)029:100: ba'i sgra dang 'od zer gyisah phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba
NK010(tha)029:101: sras dang bcas spyan drangs yab yum sku la zhugs
NK010(tha)029:102: bdud rtsi byang chub sems su zhu mkha' gsang 'od
NK010(tha)029:103: kyi gong bu las phyogs skyong dregs pa'i gdan steng
NK010(tha)029:104: du sprul pa'i khro bcu phra men gsal badz+ra kro
NK010(tha)029:105: d+ha h'u ka ra h'u gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza h'u phata steng
NK010(tha)029:106: phyogs nyi zla'i gdan steng du khro bo chen po
NK010(tha)029:107: h'u mdzad dang yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin ma
NK010(tha)029:108: sprul pa phag dang smrigs bu'i mgo badz+ra kro d+ha
NK010(tha)029:109: bi dza ya h'u ha na ha na h'u phata
NK010(tha)029:110: shar phyogs dri za'i gdan steng du khro bo rdo
NK010(tha)029:111: rje rnam par rgyal yum chen rdo rje snyems ma
NK010(tha)029:112: dang sprul pa stag dang bya rgod mgo badz+ra kro
NK010(tha)029:113: d+ha ni la dan+da h'u da ha da ha h'u
NK010(tha)029:114: phata shar lho me lha'i gdan steng du khro bo
NK010(tha)029:115: rdo rje dbyug sngon can yum chen rdo rje sder
NK010(tha)029:116: mo dang sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo badz+ra
NK010(tha)029:117: krod+ha ya m+aan+ta ka h'u pa tsa pa tsa h'u
NK010(tha)029:118: phatah lho phyogs gshin rje'i gdan steng du khro bo
NK010(tha)029:119: rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed yum chen dur khrod bdag
NK010(tha)029:120: mo dang sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo badz+ra
NK010(tha)029:121: kro d+ha +aar+ya a tsa la h'u ban+d+ha ban+d+ha h'u
NK010(tha)029:122: phatah lho nub srin po'i gdan steng du khro bo
NK010(tha)029:123: chen po mi g.yo mgon yum chen rdo rje gtun
NK010(tha)029:124: khung ma sprul pa gzig dang khwa ta'i mgo badz+ra
NK010(tha)029:125: kro d+ha ha ya g+r+ai ba h'u hu lu hu
NK010(tha)029:126: lu h'u phata nub phyogs klu yi gdan steng du
NK010(tha)029:127: khro bo chen po rta mgrin rgyal yum chen rdo
NK010(tha)029:128: rje gtum mo dang sprul pa byi la pu shud
NK010(tha)029:129: mgoh badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta h'u
NK010(tha)029:130: tish+tha tish+tha h'u phata nub byang rlung lha'i gdan steng
NK010(tha)029:131: du khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa yum chen
NK010(tha)029:132: rdo rje mda' snyems ma sprul pa spyang ki khra
NK010(tha)029:133: yi mgo badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kun+da li
NK010(tha)029:134: h'u tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha h'u phata byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan
NK010(tha)029:135: steng du khro bo rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil yum
NK010(tha)029:136: chen rdo rje rlung 'byin ma sprul pa seng ge
NK010(tha)029:137: pha wang mgo badz+ra kro d+ha tree lo kya bi
NK010(tha)029:138: dza ya h'u b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha h'u phata byang shar 'byung
NK010(tha)029:139: po'i gdan steng du khro bo rdo rje khams gsum
NK010(tha)029:140: rgyal yum chen rdo rje gsod byed ma sprul pa
NK010(tha)029:141: dom dang sre mong mgo badz+ra kro d+ha ma h+aa
NK010(tha)029:142: ba la h'u s+pho ta s+pho ta h'u phata 'og
NK010(tha)029:143: phyogs sa bdag gdan steng du khro bo rdo rje
NK010(tha)029:144: stobs po che yum chen rdo rje bskyod ma dang
NK010(tha)029:145: sprul pa dred dang byi ba'i mgo khro bcu yab
NK010(tha)029:146: yum phra thabs kun zhal gcig phyag gnyis mdog nag
NK010(tha)029:147: gzugs yab rnams phyag gnyis phur pa 'dril yum rnams
NK010(tha)029:148: dril bu thod 'dzin 'khyud mche ba can dang gshog
NK010(tha)029:149: pa can phra men mgo brnyan nyi shu ni sbrul
NK010(tha)029:150: dang thod pas rab tu brgyan phur pa lcags kyu
NK010(tha)029:151: phyag na bsnams skra bardzesa spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs
NK010(tha)029:152: dus kyi 'od zer 'phro bas 'khrugs dzahmh'u bam hoh
NK010(tha)029:153: shar phyogs dri za'i gdan steng du skya ga'i mgo
NK010(tha)029:154: can lcags kyu ma lho phyogs grul bum gdan steng
NK010(tha)029:155: du pu shud mgo can zhags pa ma nub phyogs
NK010(tha)029:156: chu bdag gdan steng du srin bya'i mgo can lcags
NK010(tha)029:157: sgrog ma byang phyogs gnod sbyin gdan steng du khra
NK010(tha)029:158: yi mgo can dril bu ma kun kyang zhal gcig
NK010(tha)029:159: phyag gnyis ma dkar ser dmar dang ljang ba'i mdog
NK010(tha)029:160: gzig dang thod sbrul rgyan du byas bskums zhing brkyangs
NK010(tha)029:161: pa'i zhabs kyis gnas phyag g.yon phur pa 'debs par
NK010(tha)029:162: mdzad me dpung dkyil na khro tshul bzhugs gzhan yang
NK010(tha)029:163: lha dang rig 'dzin dang dam can srung ma'i tshogs
NK010(tha)029:164: rnams kyang til gyi gong bu bzhin du bzhugs gnas
NK010(tha)029:165: gsum yi ge'i sa bon las rdo rje gsum du
NK010(tha)029:166: byin rlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
NK010(tha)029:167: ye shes lnga yi dbang mchog bskur h'u thabs kyis
NK010(tha)029:168: spyod pas 'gro don du byams dang snying rjes gang
NK010(tha)029:169: 'dul ba sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas dbang
NK010(tha)029:170: dang byin rlabs bdag stsol cig +aahmh'u h'u t+r+aam h+r+ai
NK010(tha)029:171: +aah skabs 'dir rdzas kyi phur pa sras mchog tu
NK010(tha)029:172: bskyed cing dbang bskur byin rlabs bya'o //
NK010(tha)029:173: de nas ye shes pa spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK010(tha)029:174: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi gnas gsum gyi sa bon las
NK010(tha)029:175: 'od zer 'phros pas mkha' khyab kyi rgyal ba sras
NK010(tha)029:176: dang bcas pa thams cad dpal rdo rje gzhon nu'i
NK010(tha)029:177: dkyil 'khor gsum gyi rnam par spyan drangs badz+ra sa
NK010(tha)029:178: m+aa dza h'u srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang
NK010(tha)029:179: dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir ye shes khro
NK010(tha)029:180: bo gshegs su gsol ye shes khro bo gshegs nas
NK010(tha)029:181: kyang rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang k+ai la
NK010(tha)029:182: ya yi dngos grub stsol sh+r+ai badz+ra ku m+aa ra
NK010(tha)029:183: sa pa ri w+aa ra e h+ye hi badz+ra sa
NK010(tha)029:184: m+aa dza dzahmh'u bam ho bzhugs su gsol ba ni
NK010(tha)029:185: / h'u sngon gyi thugs dam chen po bzhin sgrub
NK010(tha)029:186: la dngos grub stsol ba'i phyir ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor
NK010(tha)029:187: dam pa 'dir gnyis med ngang du bzhugs su gsol
NK010(tha)029:188: badz+ra sa ma ya tish+tha lhan phyag 'tshal ba ni
NK010(tha)029:189: / / h'u srid gsum gdug pa bsgral ba dang
NK010(tha)029:190: nga rgyal bdud rnams gzhom pa yi dpa' bo rdo
NK010(tha)029:191: rje 'khor bcas la rtse gcig yid dad gus pas
NK010(tha)029:192: 'dud a ti pu ho pra ti tsa ho mchod
NK010(tha)029:194: h'u he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang dur khrod
NK010(tha)029:195: chen po'i gnas brgyad nas dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan
NK010(tha)029:196: drangs te dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru zhing
NK010(tha)029:197: chen gsar rnying ti rar bcas dmar gyi argam rgya
NK010(tha)029:198: mtshor bskyil mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs la 'bul ma
NK010(tha)029:199: lus gshegs nas bsnams su gsol mchod pa'i phyag rgya
NK010(tha)029:200: chen po ni sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis
NK010(tha)029:201: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkangs te dkyil 'khor lha
NK010(tha)029:202: la dgyes par 'bul sh+r+ai badz+ra ku m+aa ra sa
NK010(tha)029:203: pa ri w+aa ra ar+g+ham sogs /
NK010(tha)029:204: shap+ta pra ti ts+tsha ho ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri
NK010(tha)029:205: ta kh+aa hi ma h+aa rak+ta kh+aa hi ma h+aa
NK010(tha)029:206: ba ling ta kh+aa hi ma h+aa su kha p+au
NK010(tha)029:207: tsa kh+aa hih de nas bstod pa bya ba ni
NK010(tha)029:208: / h'u bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba yih 'od
NK010(tha)029:209: zer 'phro 'du'i klong dkyil na khro bo khro mo
NK010(tha)029:210: rnams bzhugs pa sku ni cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs
NK010(tha)029:211: h'u dbu skra kham nag ral pa can gyen du
NK010(tha)029:212: 'khyil zhing srid rtser 'bar mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang
NK010(tha)029:213: mig ni log par lta ba 'dul ba'i spyan h'u
NK010(tha)029:214: mche ba zangs yag gtsigs pa ni skye shi'i rtsa
NK010(tha)029:215: ba gcod pa'i tshul sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs
NK010(tha)029:216: las phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang snang h'u thugs
NK010(tha)029:217: rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar gtibs byams pa'i 'od zer
NK010(tha)029:218: glog bzhin 'gyur rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogasah
NK010(tha)029:219: sprul pa'i thog ser char ltar 'bebs h'u sngon gyi
NK010(tha)029:220: thugs dam chen po ni klan ka chen po bdud
NK010(tha)029:221: la tshol kyal kha chen po bgegs la tshol yal
NK010(tha)029:222: gam can la dngos grub stsol h'u thugs dam chen
NK010(tha)029:223: po'i byin rlabs kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab mdzad
NK010(tha)029:224: cing bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams 'grub par
NK010(tha)029:225: byin gyis brlab tu gsol h'u 'khyil zhing rgyan yang
NK010(tha)029:226: 'khyil ba che sems la brjod med sku mi mnga'
NK010(tha)029:227: sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste bsam dang bral
NK010(tha)029:228: ba'i ye shes lags h'u srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha
NK010(tha)029:229: la phyag 'tshal bstod mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la
NK010(tha)029:230: phyag 'tshal bstod khro bo longs spyod mdzad la phyag
NK010(tha)029:231: 'tshal bstod rdo rje 'du 'phro mdzad la phyag 'tshal
NK010(tha)029:232: bstod h'u khro rgyal 'dus pa'i sras mchog k+ai la
NK010(tha)029:233: ya ma g.yos che mchog sku gsung thugs kyi bdag
NK010(tha)029:234: sdug bsngal log par 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams thugs
NK010(tha)029:235: rje'i bye brag dbyings su sgrol mdzad pa thabs kyis
NK010(tha)029:236: bsgral ba'i skal dang mi ldan yang shugs kyis bsgral
NK010(tha)029:237: ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol de nas bzlas pa
NK010(tha)029:238: / bya ba ni / thugs ka'i dpal be'i gnam
NK010(tha)029:239: sgo ru rta mgrin dmar pos srung ba yi ye
NK010(tha)029:240: shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i dbus nyi dkyil h'u la
NK010(tha)029:241: sngags kyis bskor 'od zer 'phro 'dus don gnyis byas
NK010(tha)029:242: snang srid rdo rje phur pa'i lha kun kyang sngags
NK010(tha)029:243: kyi rang sgra sgrogs badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya
NK010(tha)029:244: h'u phata rtsa ba'i snying po 'bru bcu pa dngah
NK010(tha)029:245: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya sarba big+ha nan bam
NK010(tha)029:246: h'u phata dza h'u a sgrub pa'i snying po 'bru
NK010(tha)029:248: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya dip+ta tsakra ha na
NK010(tha)029:249: ha na ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u yab
NK010(tha)029:250: yum gnyis su med pa'i snying po 'bru nyer gsum
NK010(tha)029:251: ma dang gsang ba spu gri'i drag sngags bcas ci
NK010(tha)029:252: rigs bazla'o // gzhan yang spro na gong gi khro bcu'i sngags dang /
NK010(tha)029:253: sgo ma'i sa bon yang ci ltar rigs par bazla'o //
NK010(tha)029:254: mtshon cha phyag mtshan yig 'bru dang me 'od du
NK010(tha)029:255: ba 'ja' dang sgrah dregs byed mngon sum mthong ba
NK010(tha)029:256: na tshe dang longs spyod mi nyams 'phel rig 'dzin
NK010(tha)029:257: sa dang dbyings rnams 'thob khams gsum yongs sgrol ting
NK010(tha)029:258: 'dzin gyis nam mkha' chos sku nyag gcig thob skabs
NK010(tha)029:260: h'u stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na phyogs bzhi
NK010(tha)029:261: dbus lnga'i 'jig rteen gyi brtan g.yo rtsi shing nags
NK010(tha)029:262: tshal kun kun kyang rdo rje phur pa'i lha zhal
NK010(tha)029:263: gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad mthing nag me yi
NK010(tha)029:264: 'od 'phro zhing rgod dang gshe dang khro bo'i tshul
NK010(tha)029:265: phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha yis 'gro drug b+ha
NK010(tha)029:266: ga'i dbyings su sbyor zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi zil gyis
NK010(tha)029:267: gnon khro bo'i sprul pas nam mkha' gang khro mo'i
NK010(tha)029:268: sprul pas sa gzhi gang phra men sprul pas bar
NK010(tha)029:269: snang gang sgo ma'i sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed thams
NK010(tha)029:270: cad bde ba'i klong nas shar bsam gyis mi khyab
NK010(tha)029:271: kun las 'das brjod med dbyings kyi thig le che
NK010(tha)029:272: snang srid gzhir bzhengs dkyil 'khor lha'i zhal nas phur
NK010(tha)029:273: pa'i sngags sgra sgrogs gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs su
NK010(tha)029:274: gsol gnas 'dir spyan 'dren gshegs nas kyang dkyil 'khor
NK010(tha)029:275: 'di la brtan par bzhugs phur pa 'di la dbang
NK010(tha)029:276: zhig skur phur pa 'di la byin gyis rlobs rtags
NK010(tha)029:277: dang mtshan ma dbyung ba dang rig 'dzin bdag la
NK010(tha)029:278: dngos grub stsol badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya ru
NK010(tha)029:279: lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u zhes sogs bazla'oh thun
NK010(tha)029:280: mthar mchod cing bstod par bya'oh de nas tshogs kyi
NK010(tha)029:281: mchod pa ni sha chang sogs tshogs kyi dam rdzas
NK010(tha)029:282: rnams bsang la sarba d+r+aa byam sho d+ha ni h'u
NK010(tha)029:283: phata ram yam khamh +aah h'uh tshogs rdzas bde chen
NK010(tha)029:284: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi rnam pa thams cad pa'i
NK010(tha)029:285: rang bzhin du gyur spyan 'dren pa ni /
NK010(tha)029:286: h'u srid pa'i phur bu sgrub pa dang dbang dang
NK010(tha)029:287: dngos grub blang ba'i phyir 'dod yon tshogs kyi mchod
NK010(tha)029:288: pa la ye shes khro bo gshegs su gsol badz+ra
NK010(tha)029:289: sa m+aa dzah sa ma ya tish+tha lhan mchod pa
NK010(tha)029:290: ni / h'u bla med mchog gi mchod pa dam
NK010(tha)029:291: pa 'di ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par
NK010(tha)029:292: 'phro 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis rab brgyan pa
NK010(tha)029:293: dam tshig bzhin du ci bder bzhes su gsol h'u
NK010(tha)029:294: dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab tshogs phud mchod
NK010(tha)029:295: pa bzhes su gsol sprul pa chen po'i dus la
NK010(tha)029:296: bab chogs phud mchod pa bzhes su gsol phyag brnyan
NK010(tha)029:297: chen po'i dus la bab tshogs phud mchod pa bzhes
NK010(tha)029:298: su gsol ma h+aa ga na tsakra p+au tsa kh+aa
NK010(tha)029:300: h'u rdo rje phur pa'i lha tshogs dgongs su gsol
NK010(tha)029:301: ma rig bdag cag lus dang ngag sems kyis bag
NK010(tha)029:302: med tshul gyis dam las 'gal gyur te 'dod khro
NK010(tha)029:303: gti mug dbang gis nongs bgyis pa dkyil 'khor lha
NK010(tha)029:304: tshogs rnams la mthol lo bshags 'gyur med tshangs pa
NK010(tha)029:305: mchog gi dngos grub stsol yig brgya bzla /
NK010(tha)029:308: n+ri tri dza zhes dmigs bya gsal btab la /
NK010(tha)029:310: h'u dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab sprul pa
NK010(tha)029:311: chen po'i dus la bab phyag brnyan chen po'i dus
NK010(tha)029:312: la bab sho na mu kha'i dus la bab sa
NK010(tha)029:313: bdag chen mo'i dus la bab bdag nyid chen po'i
NK010(tha)029:314: dus la bab bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i tshogs
NK010(tha)029:315: khyed kyi dam tshig dus la bab mthu rtsal dbyung
NK010(tha)029:316: ba'i dus la bab sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas
NK010(tha)029:317: bzhin mngon spyod phrin las 'grub par mdzod h'u byang
NK010(tha)029:318: chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing dus gsum rgyal ba'i
NK010(tha)029:319: gdung 'tshob pa'i rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni
NK010(tha)029:320: gnod cing gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs bdud dang bar
NK010(tha)029:321: du gcod pa rnams khro bo chen po'i byin rlabs
NK010(tha)029:322: kyis gtogs shig grog dang phral bar gyis phob cig
NK010(tha)029:323: rnam par gzir bar gyis zungs shig rgyob cing rnam
NK010(tha)029:324: par chings rings par khug la smrar chug cig mngon
NK010(tha)029:325: spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang lus ngag rdul du
NK010(tha)029:326: bshig nas kyang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzod
NK010(tha)029:327: badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u phata dgra bgegs
NK010(tha)029:328: ha sa ya ra ha sa ya ra h+r+ai ta
NK010(tha)029:329: na h'u phata dgra bgegs a be sha ya a
NK010(tha)029:330: be sha ya h'u phata dgra bgegs sh+ai g+h+ram a
NK010(tha)029:331: na ya h'u phata dgra bgegs dz+wa la pa ya
NK010(tha)029:332: dz+wa la pa ya h'u phatah de nas gdab kha
NK010(tha)029:333: dngos la / h'u snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig
NK010(tha)029:334: ni bsad cing mnan pa ma yin te phung po
NK010(tha)029:335: rdo rjes gtams byas nas rnam par shes pa rdo
NK010(tha)029:336: rjer bsgom lam h+aum lam s+t+wam+b+ha ya nan mo ha
NK010(tha)029:337: g+ha ta ya b+ha ga wan badz+ra h'u ka ra
NK010(tha)029:338: dzahmh'u bam ho sarba big+ha nam badz+ra k+ai li k+ai
NK010(tha)029:339: la ya h'u phata h'u ka ra h'u h'u ka
NK010(tha)029:341: drag sngags bzla zhing tshe khrus gnas gsum gyi dgongs pa ldan pas bsgral de nas sha khrag /
NK010(tha)029:344: h'u dgra bgegs sha ni zan las zhim gti mug
NK010(tha)029:345: mchod pa bla na med dgra bgegs khrag ni chang
NK010(tha)029:346: bas zhim 'dod chags mchod pa bla na med dgra
NK010(tha)029:347: bgegs rus rkang mar bas zhim zhe sdang mchod pa
NK010(tha)029:348: bla na med bla med mchod pa 'di 'bul gyis
NK010(tha)029:349: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol ma h+aa mam
NK010(tha)029:350: sa rak+ta kem ni ri ti kh+aa ti tshogs la
NK010(tha)029:351: rol / tshogs kyi lhag ma rnams /
NK010(tha)029:352: +aahmh'u ha ho h+r+ai lhag ma'i dam rdzas 'dod yon
NK010(tha)029:353: gyi phung por gyur e a ra li hring dzahs
NK010(tha)029:354: spyan drangs / h'u bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i
NK010(tha)029:355: tshogs khyed kyi dam tshig dus la babs lhag ma'i
NK010(tha)029:356: gtor ma 'di bzhes la mthu rtsal dbyung ba'i dus
NK010(tha)029:357: la babs sngon chad ji ltar dam bcas bzhin mngon
NK010(tha)029:358: spyod phrin las 'grub par mdzod ush+tsi ta b+ha ling
NK010(tha)029:359: ta kh+aa hi bsgral las rgyas pa dug phur nag
NK010(tha)029:360: po ltar bya'o las rjes bsdu zhing bsngo smon bkra
NK010(tha)029:361: shis spyi ltar bya'o rgyud kyi dgongs pa bzhin rdo
NK010(tha)029:362: rje thugs mchog rtsal gyis bsdebs pa dge legs mchog
NK010(tha)029:363: spyan drangs / tu gyur cig / d+ha ti rnam
NK010(tha)029:364: gsum gyi drag sngags tshig dril spu gri 'bar ba
NK010(tha)029:365: spyan drangs / tu gyur cig / ni / sgrub
NK010(tha)029:366: sngags mthar ma rak+mo yak+mo k+aa la ru pa snying
NK010(tha)029:367: rtsa la yam yam srog rtsa la yam yam snying
NK010(tha)029:368: la phril phril srog la chum chum tsit+ta srog la
NK010(tha)029:369: dung dung snying khrag srog la shad shad thum ril
NK010(tha)029:370: ril tseg tseg 'ur 'ur shig shig gul gul myags
NK010(tha)029:371: myags sod sod d+ha ti ma ma karma sh+r+ai g+h+ram
NK010(tha)029:372: ka ra ye m+aa ra se na pra ma d+ha
NK010(tha)029:374: mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa rgyu dbyibs tshad ldan 'du byas la /
NK010(tha)029:375: shu nya ta'i sngags kyis stong par sbyang /
NK010(tha)029:376: mtshan ma rdzas kyi phur pa mi dmigs pa'i ngang
NK010(tha)029:377: las bdag nyid rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum gyi
NK010(tha)029:378: mkha' gsang nas h'u gcig 'phros 'dus yongs su gyur
NK010(tha)029:379: pa las badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u phata
NK010(tha)029:380: zhes brjod pas / sras mchog phur bu zhal gsum
NK010(tha)029:381: phyag drug pa phyag mtshan dang rgyan cha gtso bo
NK010(tha)029:382: dang mtshungs pa sku smad gnam lcags kyi phur bu
NK010(tha)029:383: zur gsum 'bar ba'i dpal dang ldan par gsal ba'i
NK010(tha)029:384: lcum zhog gi dbus ldir ba der b+h+r+aum las gzhal
NK010(tha)029:385: yas khang gi dbus su gtso bo yab yum dbu
NK010(tha)029:386: rgyan gyi lha dang bcas pa dang lcum zhog brgyad
NK010(tha)029:387: la phyogs mtshams kyi khro bo yab yum phra men
NK010(tha)029:388: dang bcas pa rgya mdud gong mar h'u ka ra
NK010(tha)029:389: yab yum mgo brnyan dang bcas pa rgya mdud 'og
NK010(tha)029:390: mar stobs po che yab yum phra men dang bcas
NK010(tha)029:391: pa de'i log bzhir sgo ma bzhi dpal gyi nang
NK010(tha)029:392: du phur skyong srung ma'i tshogs ma lus pa gsal
NK010(tha)029:393: zhing dpal gyi zur gsum du h'u gsum logs gsum
NK010(tha)029:394: phata gsum rtse mo a dkar po gcig dang bcas
NK010(tha)029:395: pa gsal bar gyur de nas sor mo lag pa'i
NK010(tha)029:396: rgyab du bsnol gung mo gnyis bsgreng ba chu srin
NK010(tha)029:397: rnam grol gyi 'khyud phyag spyad rgyas blangs lah ngag
NK010(tha)029:398: tuh sa ma ya dzah zhes barjodah de nas sor
NK010(tha)029:399: mo pad+ma kha phye ba 'dra bar sbyar te lag
NK010(tha)029:400: mthil du phur pa 'dril zhing lag g.yas ma las
NK010(tha)029:401: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la kun tu bzang po sor
NK010(tha)029:402: mo lnga la rigs lnga g.yon pa a las zla
NK010(tha)029:403: dkyil la kun tu bzang mo sor mo lnga la
NK010(tha)029:404: yum lnga gsal ba yab yum sbyor ba mdzad pas
NK010(tha)029:405: yum gyi mkha' gsang du bzhugs pa'i sras mchog phur
NK010(tha)029:406: bur ye shes lngas dbang bskur bar bsam la sor
NK010(tha)029:407: mo cung zad bsnol zhing phur pa 'dril dbang bskur
NK010(tha)029:408: ba'i sngags lnga'am bsdu na +aahmh'u s+w+aa h+aa zhes brjod
NK010(tha)029:410: sras mchog gi spyi bor 'khor lo'i dbus su dkar
NK010(tha)029:411: po la bud+d+ha k+ai la ya'i sngags kyis bskor ba
NK010(tha)029:412: las 'od zer 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku
NK010(tha)029:413: yi byin rlabs dang dngos grub ma lus pa bsdus
NK010(tha)029:414: te sras mchog gi spyi bor thim pas sku yi
NK010(tha)029:415: sgo nas khams gsum dus gcig la sgrol ba'i mthu
NK010(tha)029:416: stobs nus pa dang ldan par bsam la /
NK010(tha)029:417: bud+d+ha k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u phata bdun la
NK010(tha)029:418: sogs pa bazla'o mgrin par pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi dbus
NK010(tha)029:419: su +aahdamara po la pad+ma k+ai la ya'i sngags kyis
NK010(tha)029:420: bskoor ba las 'od zer 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad
NK010(tha)029:421: kyi gsung gi byin rlabs dang dngos grub ma lus
NK010(tha)029:422: pa bsdus te mgrin par thim pas gsung gi sgo
NK010(tha)029:423: nas khams gsum dus gcig la sgrol ba'i mthu stobs
NK010(tha)029:424: nus pa dang ldan par bsam la pad+ma k+ai li
NK010(tha)029:425: k+ai la ya h'u phata zhes bdun la sogs pa
NK010(tha)029:426: brjod / thugs kar rdo rje sngon po'i lte bar h'u mthing ka la /
NK010(tha)029:427: badz+ra k+ai la ya'i sngags kyis bskor ba las 'od
NK010(tha)029:428: zer 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi byin
NK010(tha)029:429: rlabs dang dngos grub ma lus pa bsdus te thugs
NK010(tha)029:430: kar thim pas thugs kyi sgo nas khams gsum dus
NK010(tha)029:431: gcig la sgrol ba'i mthu stobs nus pa dang ldan
NK010(tha)029:432: par bsam la badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya h'u
NK010(tha)029:433: phata bdun sogs bazla'o de nas byugs bdug brabs gsum
NK010(tha)029:434: gyis las la bskul zhing gzi byin bskyed pa ni
NK010(tha)029:435: gtso phur lag g.yas su bzung byugs pa'i rdzas sogs
NK010(tha)029:436: nye bar bzhag la h'u gu gul sbyar bas byin
NK010(tha)029:437: bskyed dgra bgegs sgrol nyungs kar rgyal pos rgyud bskul
NK010(tha)029:438: bar chad gdul rak+ta khol mas dam skong gzi mdangs
NK010(tha)029:439: bskyed bar chad gdug pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du rlog
NK010(tha)029:440: ces bya la gu gul dang tshil chen sbyar ba'i
NK010(tha)029:441: dud pas phur pa bdug cing badz+ra k+ai li k+ai
NK010(tha)029:442: la ya ma gu ta la ma gu ta la
NK010(tha)029:443: pra ta la pra ta la sha la ra tsa
NK010(tha)029:444: h'u dgra bgegs 'byung po m+aa ra ya h'u phata
NK010(tha)029:445: zhes ci rigs bzlas pas sngon gyi sgrol ba drag
NK010(tha)029:446: po'i zhe sdang rjes su dran nas spyan rtsa dmar
NK010(tha)029:447: log gis song nas gdug pa'i dbal dang ldan pa
NK010(tha)029:448: mi bzad pa'i rno ngar thogs rdugs med pa'i nus
NK010(tha)029:449: pa dang ldan par bsam pa ni thugs mnyes pa'i
NK010(tha)029:450: mchod pa'o de nas yungs kar gyis brabs la badz+ra
NK010(tha)029:451: k+ai li k+ai la ya bee ta li ma d+ha
NK010(tha)029:452: la rak+sha rak+sha h'u phatah su ru su ru pra
NK010(tha)029:453: pa su ru a ti tish+tha mugs mugs ha la
NK010(tha)029:454: ha la dgra bgegs 'a byung po'i tsit+ta myogs m+aa
NK010(tha)029:455: ra ya h'u phata zhes brjod pas ba spu'i bu
NK010(tha)029:456: ga tshun chod kyang khro chung gis gtams nas rdo
NK010(tha)029:457: rje'i gzi byin bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar bas bar
NK010(tha)029:458: chad thams cad rdul du brlag pa 'i nus pa
NK010(tha)029:459: dang ldan par bsam pa ni sku mnyes pa'i mchod
NK010(tha)029:460: pa'o // de nas mi rta gcan gzan ra khyi
NK010(tha)029:461: phag pa'i khrag sogs khrag sna dang re lcag spyang
NK010(tha)029:462: tsher ri sho bse zho btsan dug sogs dug sna
NK010(tha)029:463: sbyar bas byugs shing badz+ra k+ai li k+ai la ya
NK010(tha)029:464: ma h+aa rak+ta dz+wa la ma d+ha la ma d+ha
NK010(tha)029:465: la rak+sha rak+sha dgra bgegs pa sham ku ru m+aa
NK010(tha)029:466: ra ya h'u phata zhes ci rigs bzlas pasah gdul
NK010(tha)029:467: bya gdug pa can nam yang mi gtong ba'i thugs
NK010(tha)029:468: dam rjes su chags pa'i gzi mdangs lhag par rgyas
NK010(tha)029:469: shing phur pa dmar nag dud kha reg pas 'joms
NK010(tha)029:470: pa gcig tu gyur par bsam pa ni gsung mnyes
NK010(tha)029:471: pa'i mchod pa'o de ltar byas pas rdzas kyi dud
NK010(tha)029:472: pa dug gi sprin dmar nag tu 'khrigs pa'i gseb
NK010(tha)029:473: nas 'bar ba'i sras mchog shin tu rngams pa'i gar
NK010(tha)029:474: dgus rol pa'i gzi byin bzod par dka' ba bskal
NK010(tha)029:475: pa'i me dpung 'bum ltar 'bar zhing drag sngags kyi
NK010(tha)029:476: nga ro 'brug stong ltar sgrogs pa sprul pa'i khro
NK010(tha)029:477: chung dang mtshon cha'i thog ser drag tu babs pas
NK010(tha)029:478: bar chad thal bar brlag cing rnam shes dbang du
NK010(tha)029:479: bsdus par bsam la drag sngags snying po tshar gcig
NK010(tha)029:480: brjod nas dgra bgegs kyi snying dkar nag gi mtshams
NK010(tha)029:481: su bzhugs par bsam lah sa ma ya tish+tha lhanah
NK010(tha)029:482: zhes brjod la dal du phur pa'i gdan la bzhag
NK010(tha)029:483: pa'o // go // de nas dkyil 'khor gsum sogs gzhung ltar ro //
